amendment.description: To clarify the apportionment of funds from the Aviation Security Capital Fund.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 891 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 891 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S7783-7785, S7792; text: CR S7783) To clarify the apportionment of funds from the Aviation Security Capital Fund.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 891 proposed by Senator Reid.
